name: Limited Exp
description:
Based on the Metro trains in Melbourne and inspired by our constant late nights in the city. This prototype is an experience of our journey home.

The game's art direction is influenced by Shaun Tan's works, particularly the 'sketchy' style. Limited Exp focuses on the uneasy feeling of being on the train late at night as well as the response that each individual would do to counter uneasiness, which is, listening to music... Well, at least that is what makes us feel at ease.

We’re females, the night is creepy and we love music.

Controls:
Mouse
And others when prompted.

Music:
Take A Walk by Passion Pit.
Unity by TheFatRat.

Developers:
